Perceptor:

Perceptor growled and went come in Pred's base to CR's 
Chambers, 'cause he guess that Hydras wouldn't be disturbed while he 
controled the puppet

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Megatron Revived:
>  
> The clone sighed, grinned and stepped back.
> "Then forgive me for wasting your time.  Perhaps we may speak 
again."
> He lifted into the air and ascended into the sky.  Once he was 
high enough, he breifly scanned for the Maximal base.  He found it, 
and more signifigantly, Organics' energy signature.  Smiling, he 
somersaulted in the air, and transformed.  The gunship lit it's 
engines and took off, heading straight for the Maximal base.
> 
> MaximaSR74@a... wrote:
> 
> More evil laughter escaped Megatron Revived's voice processors.  
She is definatly Leader material.
> "If you are trying to get to an important point, please do so 
now.  If I am supposed to remember you, you'll have to schedule a 
time for us to, sit down and chat.  But right now I fear my family 
is in dire straits.  To the point-"
> The massive and powerful transformer showed a little of his speed 
when he closed the gap between them in a mere two seconds.
> "Tell me were the bounty hunters Malice and Organics are." he said 
simply, no longer enjoying this very entertaining conversation.
> 
> 
> Unwavering, locking those crimson optics upon his. "I'm afraid I 
cannot help you there. I have no knowledge of whom you seek," spoken 
calmly. 
>
